item.title: Antonio Herrera appointed Group Leader
item.description: We are proud to announce that Dr. Antonio Herrera, a postdoctoral researcher in our lab since 2021, has been awarded a prestigious Ram√≥n y Cajal fellowship! Toni will start his own research group at the University of Granada, Spain, in the second half of 2026. During his time in the La Manno Lab, Toni has made fundamental contributions to our research program, including developing computational methods for spatial transcriptomics analysis and contributing to multiple high-impact publications.
